verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: resumed] up [ARG1: his verbal assault on the special counsel investigation probing Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election] [ARGM-MNR: with a fresh series of Twitter messages on Saturday] .

President Donald Trump resumed up his verbal assault on [ARG0: the special counsel investigation] [V: probing] [ARG1: Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election] with a fresh series of Twitter messages on Saturday .
